pages.text: $(l)Shops will never be auctioned without the owner's consent.$()$(br2)The shop auctions will exist to help facilitate two situations:

1.) A shop owner no longer wants their shop but doesn't want to tear it down, so they'd like to find someone else to take over.$(br2)They may choose whether to auction just the stock, the stock and the build, or the stock, shop build, and shop name.

2.) A section of a reviewed shop is being removed, but the stock is sizeable/could theoretically be its own shop.$(br2)This will be auctioned as the stock only, for anyone who wants to make a shop with it.

Shop owners will always be encouraged to come up with their own starting bids. They should be cautioned not to expect to make the full value of all their stock.$(br2)$(l)Who can Bid?$()$(br)Players who do not have a shop on the server, or players with fewer than 3 shops may bid.
